message: ptt 跟 slack 都出狀況，這個萬聖節還蠻多鬼怪的 XD
story: Finjon Kiang shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: A major outage took out Slack’s services for what appeared to be a large portion of its userbase Tuesday afternoon. It’s not immediately clear what caused the outage: Slack acknowledged it was having…
name: Now that’s scary: Slack goes down on Halloween
